definition[0]: used to ask a question in an indirect way, especially if you think the answer will be ‘no’
example[0]: I don’t suppose you have any idea where my address book is, do you?
definition[1]: used to ask for something in a very polite way
example[1]: I don’t suppose you’d give me a lift to the station?
definition[2]: used to say that you think it is unlikely something will happen
example[2]: I don’t suppose I’ll ever see her again.
